jd: From: sanjeev, HMG America LLC sanjeev@hmgamerica.com Reply to: sanjeev@hmgamerica.com DB2/IDMS DBA Remote Experience : 7-12 Years Description-IDMS DBA - Application level DB experience - record structure changes; creating indexes; planning and executing large installs that include database, online, and batch changes; DB monitoring; building copying CVs, backup restores IDMS Programming - IDMS internal security; heavy experience with ADS online code - Dialogs, Maps, and Applications, ADSALIVE and other debugging Other helpful experience: CA Endeavor - administration or at least heavy user experience including problem resolution ASG Replication Suite - probably will be difficult to find, fortunately we rarely perform updates ASG Virtual Database - basic understanding of how it works CA-7 - CA-11 scheduling tools Required details-IDMS DBA - Application level DB experience - record structure changes; creating indexes; planning and executing large installs that include database, online, and batch changes; DB monitoring; building/copying CVs, backup/restores IDMS Programming - IDMS internal security; heavy experience with ADS online code - Dialogs, Maps, and Applications, ADSALIVE and other debugging Other helpful experience: CA Endevor - administration or at least heavy user experience including problem resolution ASG Replication Suite - probably will be difficult to find, fortunately we rarely perform updates ASG Virtual Database - basic understanding of how it works CA-7 - CA-11 scheduling tools
